CompanionAwarePreparer

public abstract class CompanionAwarePreparer
extends Object implements ITargetPreparer

java.lang.Object
   ↳ com.android.tradefed.targetprep.companion.CompanionAwarePreparer
Known Direct Subclasses
CheckPairingPreparer
CheckPairingPreparer A CompanionAwarePreparer that verifies BT bonding between primary and companion devices  

An ITargetPreparer that encapsulates the logic of getting an already allocated companion device.

Note: that this must be used in conjunction with a CompanionAllocator.
